TeleDirect’s Inbound Call Center Services

What can brands expect from TeleDirect’s inbound call center outsourcing? Unlike other inbound call center outsourcing companies, TeleDirect provides comprehensive service across platforms.

  • Lead Qualification
    TeleDirect’s call center outsourcing vendors help you find viable leads for more efficient practice.
  • Customer Service
    We’ll handle every incoming query with a smile.
  • Order Processing
    Take the stress out of payments and processing.
  • Tier 1 Tech Support
    Our IT agents are at your service.
  • Reservation Services
    RSVP to the most thorough booking service out there.
  • Direct Response & Media Support
    We utilize modern marketing strategies to ensure more growth.
  • Overflow & After-Hours Support
    When problems arise after business hours, we’re here to help.
  • Help Desk Services
    With us, there’s always a helpful voice at the end of the line.

TeleDirect’s Outbound Call Center Services

What can brands expect from TeleDirect’s outbound outsource call center? Unlike other outbound call center outsourcing services, TeleDirect provides comprehensive service across platforms.

  • Lead Generation
    Never let another lead slip through the cracks — we’ll help find them.
  • Market Research
    We go straight to the source — your clients — to better market your brand.
  • Telesales & Upsells
    Our outbound agents are sales experts!
  • Surveys & Feedbacks
    Don’t wonder how your customers feel — let us ask them!
  • Customer Retention
    Better service leads to more loyalty. We’ll show you how.
  • Appointment Setting
    Take all the stress out of bookings and reservations.
  • Scheduled Callbacks
    Communicate with clients at their convenience.

Call Center Outsourcing Services: FAQs

What is Business Process Outsourcing (BPO)?

BPO is a common business practice where a company outsources a dedicated company to perform a specific job. At TeleDirect, we offer BPO customer support and contact services to companies spanning hundreds of industries.

Are there benefits of outsourcing call center services?

Absolutely. Customer service is crucial to business success — but there’s an art to it. At TeleDirect, we have perfected that art. We become an extension of your team, allowing you to focus on your industry and trade while we handle communication and customer support. Now you’re happy, your customers are happy and we’re happy, too!

What industries benefit from BPO call centers?

They all do. From e-commerce to financial services, call center outsourcing is an ideal investment for any industry. It serves your customers better, captures more leads and creates a better working environment overall.

Business is booming right now but will slow down again after the season. Is BPO still ideal?

Yes! At TeleDirect, we offer fully scalable services. During your high-volume periods, we will ensure you have proper agent coverage to support all your needs. When things quiet down, we’ll reel it back until your next busy season.

Can small businesses benefit from call centers?

They sure can. At TeleDirect, we work with companies of all sizes and across industries. As long as you have customers, we are here to ensure they have the support they need. Call (800) 776-1081 to learn more.
